attributes.additional_details: Consider an apprentice/small wage to improve retention/desirability of the healthcare professions. Whilst on full time placement for long periods of time we cannot work as well. We pay for parking, petrol out of our own pockets and wait months for a refund if any. This would attract and retain students as we are doing the same work as the paid employees.
attributes.background: Pay students whilst they are on placement for the thousands of hours they put in for free. Unable to work whilst on placement, pay petrol, food, childcare etc.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Minimum wage pay for all healthcare students for placement hours worked: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619609

Pay student teachers for their placement and provide bursaries for training: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/620461
